items.sentence: I have a few household chores that I must do.
I have a lot of things that I must deal with.
I have a pick, two shovels and a wheelbarrow.
I have a pretty good idea where Tom might be.
Please don\'t interrupt me when I\'m talking.
The baseball game was called off due to rain.
Tom asked Mary what kind of movies she liked.
Tom asked Mary what she thought he should do.
Tom asked Mary where he should hang his coat.
Tom asked Mary who had given her the picture.
Tom asked me for help when he was in trouble.
Tom tried to open the door, but he couldn\'t.
You realize how dangerous Tom is, don\'t you?
You shouldn\'t judge others by how they look.
It\'s been thirty years since we got married.
It\'s easy to get lost, so please be careful.
It\'s not as easy to do that as people think.
I heard that Tom and Mary want to talk to me.
I heard that Tom got married to a rich woman.
I heard that Tom is planning to come with us.
